page.title: 16Barrington School
page.content:
Barrington School-Spring Term 1985. On February 13th.we had a mini Barn Dance.We played games & danced some country dances.We had some fizzy pop & crisps.On Shrove Tuesday we carried out our annual Egg Shackling ceremony. Each child puts an egg in a padded sieve which is shaken gently.As each egg cracks it is taken out. The last 3 eggs in the sieve win prizes.We had a Mothering Day service in the church.We sang some hymns:some of us read out the prayers we had made up & 2 children read from the Bible. In March our boys took part in a football competition at Neroche school at Broadway but they didn't win.
Jessica Brunt aged 9 years
